issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Build fails with this simple line:
{code:java}
var webView = require('Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.WebView');
{code}

Same result with -T wp-emulator and ws-local.

Error log:
{noformat}
[INFO]  Alloy compiled in 11.81509s

fields.summary: Build fails when using native API call (Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.WebView)
fields.environment:
Windows 10 64bit
Titanium SD 5.1.1.GA
Windows Phone SDK 8.1

comments.body: Hello [~toshiro], Please provide a complete test case that we can use to regenerate the issue. Also please specify your complete environment information. Thanks.
